title: Address
description: A postal address. Address could relate to a persons home, work, preferred store location etc.

xdm:primary.title: Primary
xdm:primary.description: Primary address indicator. A Profile can have only one `primary` address at a given point of time.

xdm:label.title: Label
xdm:label.description: Free form name of the address.

xdm:street1.title: Street 1
xdm:street1.description: Primary Street level information, apartment number, street number and street name.

xdm:city.title: City
xdm:city.description: The town, city, village or other metropolitan identity of the address.

xdm:region.title: Region
xdm:region.description: The region, county, or district portion of the address.

xdm:stateProvince.title: State or Province
xdm:stateProvince.description: The state, province, region, territory portion of the address.

xdm:stateProvinceISO.title: State or Province ISO Code.
xdm:stateProvinceISO.description:
The country subdivision as defined by the second part of [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html#2012_iso3166-2)
(without the first part and the hyphen ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

Example:

* CA: from ISO 3166-2 `US-CA` value designating the state of California in the United States of America.
* 75: from ISO 3166-2 `FR-75` value designating the metropolitan department of Paris in France.

> NOTE: This value must be combined with countryCodeISO to compose a valid ISO 3166-2 code.

xdm:postalCode.title: Postal Code
xdm:postalCode.description: The postal code, zip code of other postal ordering for the address. Note, if zip codes are used either the base zip or zip+4 format can be used.

xdm:country.title: Country
xdm:country.description: The name of the government-administered territory.

xdm:countryISO.title: Country ISO
xdm:countryISO.description: The alpha-2 code of the country as defined by [ISO 3166-1](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html).

xdm:latitude.title: Latitude
xdm:latitude.description: Defines the latitude of the delivery address.

xdm:longitude.title: Longitude
xdm:longitude.description: Defines the longitude of the delivery address.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: An indication as to the ability to use the address.

xdm:statusReason.title: Status Reason
xdm:statusReason.description: A description of the current status.

xdm:lastVerifiedDate.title: Last Verified Date
xdm:lastVerifiedDate.description: The date that the address was last verified as still belonging to the person.
